name: Egyptian Block Breaker
description:
Uncover the mysteries of Egypt and defeat Apophis, the Serpent of Chaos!

This is an ancient Egyptian themed block breaker game, it has fairly standard mechanics but I think it has a good theme and atmosphere.

The game can be played in the browser (should work on all modern browsers) or as a Windows x86 application. To play the Windows version, download the EgyptianBlockBreaker_v1.0.zip file, extract the contents to a location, then run the EgyptianBlockBreaker_v1.0 executable.

Fair warning, the last level is a bit brutal, but there are plenty of extra lives to collect!

Have fun!
